short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Do you like war games? Help the soldier eliminate all the enemy robots with his gun in this War Robot Game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
You are a soldier on a very special mission, you have to break into a runaway factory, shoot down the robots that want to stop you, walk the walking paths and most importantly collect all the gold you can and is perfectly ready for it.
In this War Robot Game help the soldier to eliminate all the enemy robots with his weapon. Avoid all the shots of the robot and get as many coins as you can. - Play Machine Carnage Free and Enjoy! 



To swipe Install this extension to play Machine Carnage Game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads. 

You can contact with us support@724fun.com and share your thoughts and problems

After clicking the add the game to chrome button, you can find the game in the extensions section. If you wish, you can visit 724fun.com. If you wish, you can play again and if you want to remove it, you can remove it from the extensions section.
